name: Ambulance Drifter
description:
Ambulance Drifter

Rush through the city in an ambulance to successfully rescue people's lives as fast as you can! Drive with care though, as drifting and driving recklessly will harm them! Bring them back to the hospital with utmost care and collect morphine to ensure their survival, netting you a new highscore.

Play solo or split-screen multiplayer with a friend for some crazy times!

Controls:

To confirm an action in the menu, press C or V.
